bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon w/alloy chainstay & seatstay, removable Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, E2 fully integrated tapered head tube, BB95 bottom bracket, Flow Mold carbon swing link, internal cable routing, Sealth shock routing, MicroTruss, 100mm travel

components.description: Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing, 15mm alloy axle front hub; Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing, 142x12 rear hub w/Bontrager Mustang Disc 28-hole Tubeless Ready rims
Bontrager Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
